synthesis_conditions.label: General synthesis
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 1H-3,5-pyrazoledicarboxylic acid (H2PZDC), 2,4-furandicarboxylic acid (H2FDC), aqueous NaOH solution, aqueous AlCl3 solution
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with deionized water and methanol
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Dried under dynamic vacuum (~10-3 mbar) and heated to 120°C over a period of 3 hours

synthesis_conditions.label: Single crystal synthesis
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: H2PZDC or H2FDC, aqueous NaOH solution, aqueous Al2(SO4)3 solution

synthesis_conditions.label: General synthesis
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 2,4-furandicarboxylic acid (H2FDC), aqueous NaOH solution, aqueous AlCl3 solution
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with deionized water and methanol
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Dried under dynamic vacuum (~10-3 mbar) and heated to 120°C over a period of 3 hours

synthesis_conditions.label: Single crystal synthesis
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: H2FDC, aqueous NaOH solution, aqueous Al2(SO4)3 solution

synthesis_conditions.label: Synthesis of H2FDC
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Phosphoryl chloride, N,N-dimethylformamide, 3-furancarboxylic acid methyl ester, potassium dichromate, sulfuric acid, acetone, NaOH
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: Washed with water, aqueous NaHCO3 solution, and brine
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Dried over MgSO4, concentrated in vacuo
